Getting started

View the sample application View the sample application

Take a look at the devonfw application in action with our reference application and showcase "My Thai Star"

Follow the getting started tutorial

The devon4J getting started guide contains information on devonfw and in this case the devon4J backend. You'll get an overview over the devon4J application layers and functionalities, based on our My Thai Star reference application. Afterwards you'll be guided through the process of building your first devon4J backend from scratch, Jump the Queue.

Use the devon4J application template to start a new project

This resource will guide you step by step through the process of building a new devon4J application.

Help making devonfw even better Help making devonfw even better

Remember this is a joint effort and you are welcome to contribute.
